casebody.data:
John FAUCHER and Amy Faucher, Plaintiffs-Petitioners,
v.
ZONING BOARD OF ADJUSTMENT OF the CITY OF HOBOKEN and B & B Properties of Hoboken, LLC, Defendants-Respondents. C-964 September Term 2017
080756 Supreme Court of New Jersey. June 22, 2018

To the Appellate Division, Superior Court:

A petition for certification of the judgment in A-003906-15 having been submitted to this Court, and the Court having considered the same;

It is ORDERED that the petition for certification is denied, with costs.
